JobPostingSearchableField.name: JobPostingSearchableField
JobPostingSearchableField.description: Object used for searching and Filtering published Job Postings.

DepartmentName.description: The name of the department that the job position is associated with.

EndDate.description: The date when the job position vacancies were removed from the portal.

Geolocation.description: The geolocation of the advertised job position.

GeolocationLatitude.description: The latitude of the advertised job position's geolocation.

GeolocationLongitude.description: The longitude of the advertised job position's geolocation.

LocationId.description: The ID of location associated with the advertised job position.

LocationName.description: The name of the advertised job position's location.

Name.description: The name of the job posting searchable field record.

OccupationGroupId.description: The occupation group that the position is associated with.

OccupationGroupName.description: The name of the occupation group that the position is associated with.

OccupationId.description: The occupation that the position is associated with.

OccupationName.description: The name of the occupation that the position is associated with.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the job posting searchable field record owner.

PayRange.description: The pay range for the advertised job position.

PositionDescription.description: The description of the advertised job position.

PositionStatus.description: The status of the position associated with the advertised job position.

PositionTitle.description: The title of the advertised job position.

PositionType.description: The type of the position associated with the advertised job position.

RecruitmentPostingId.description: The recruitment posting that advertised the vacancies in the job position.

RecruitmentPostingName.description: The name of the recruitment posting that advertised the vacancies in the job position.

RecruitmentRequisitionId.description: The recruitment requisition associated with the recruitment posting.

RequisitionIdentifier.description: The name of the recruitment requisition associated with the recruitment posting.

StartDate.description: The date when the job position vacancies were advertised on the portal.

UniqueKey.description: A unique key for the job posting searchable field record.

VacancyCount.description: The number of vacancies in the advertised job position.

WorkScheduleType.description: The type of work schedule associated with the position associated with the advertised job position. For example, part time or full time.
